name: Piper Chapman
about: Piper is serving time in prison for carrying drugs for her ex-girlfriend Alex.

name: Alex Vause
about: Alex is carrying out her sentence for being a drug smuggler.

name: Red
about: Red is currently serving time in Litchfield for a Russian Mafia-related crime and the former head of the kitchen.

name: Gloria
about: Gloria is the head of the kitchen and a hardcore lady that takes bullshit from no one.

name: Nicky Nichols
about: Nicky is a recovering drug addict who says what’s on her mind and is currently serving time for an unknown crime.

name: Lorna Morello
about: Lorna is planning the imaginary wedding of her dreams while serving time in prison.

name: SoSo
about: SoSo is the new girl at Litchfield who has yet to find place or her way in.

name: Vee
about: Vee is a troublemaker that comes along and destroys and test relationships/friendships.

name: Taystee
about: Taystee is a young woman with a troubled past trying to come to terms and branch out on her own.

name: Crazy Eyes
about: Suzanne just wants to be loved and taken seriously but struggles to do so while serving time.

name: Poussey
about: Her name is not pronounced (Pussy) but (Poussey) and she is the supportive side kick to Taystee.

name: Janae Watson
about: Janae is a young lady who took the wrong path in life and apparently loves the SHU.

name: Black Cindy
about: Black Cindy is serving time for fucking with the TSA!? and a comedic sidekick.

name: Sophia Burset
about: Sophia will take care of your roots, weave, and also steal your credit cards if they were allowed in prison.

name: John Bennett
about: John is in love with in inmate Daya Diaz.

name: Daya Diaz
about: Daya is serving time in prison for unknown reasons and in love with John Bennett.

name: Aleida Diaz
about: Aleida Diaz is doing her best to be a better mother to her daughter Daya and serving time for unknown reasons.

name: George Mendez
about: Mendez is an asshole with feelings and has fallen hard for inmate Daya Diaz.

name: Flaca
about: Flaca is the outspoken latina and best friend of Maritza.

name: Tiffany Doggett
about: Doggett, who exhibits strong violent tendencies, became a devout Christian following her arrest. After season one, her character develops due to time in the psych ward and exploration of new friendships within the prison environment.

name: Maritza
about: Maritza is serving time for being pretty and the best friend of Flaca.

name: Natalie Figueroa
about: Figueroa is shady as hell and doesn’t care about any of the inmate at Litchfield.

name: Joe Caputo
about: Mr. Caputo runs things at Litchfield and it constantly treated like shit by Fig.

name: Mr. Healy
about: Sam is a confused man who is the complete opposite of who he was last season.

name: Pennsatucky
about: Pennsatucky is a meth head who is currently questioning her relationship with god.

name: Leanne
about: Leanne is the former Meth head friend of Pennsatucky and is obsessed with dolphins.

name: Angie
about: Angie is the meth head bestie of Leanne.

name: Yoga Jones
about: Yoga Jones is all about yoga, but not really in S2 of OITNB.

name: Sister
about: Sister Ingalls is a former Nun with a witty sense of humor.

name: Norma
about: Norma is the silent former best friend/sidekick of Red with a big heart.

name: Big Boo
about: Big Boo is the hardcore butch looking for love in Litchfield.

name: O’Neal
about: O’Neal is a mission to getting healthy and fun with C.O. Bell.

name: Gina
about: Gina was once the loyal friend/sidekick of Red until she got burned(literally).

name: Susan Fischer
about: Susan Fischer was a rookie correctional officer at Litchfield

name: Larry Bloom
about: Larry is the ex-fiance of Piper Chapman.

name: Polly Harper
about: Polly is the best friend Piper Chapman, with a witty yet sarcastic personality.

name: Luschek
about: Luschek is the asshole C.O. that’s suppose to fix shit that’s broken but he never does.

name: Rosa Cisneros
about: Rosa is serving time at Litchfield from a series of bank robberies.

name: Wanda Bell
about: Wanda is the C.O. that doesn’t mind telling you to squat & cough.

name: Cal
about: Cal is the loyal yet outspoken brother of Piper Chapman

name: Stella
about: Stella the newbie in Litchfield… and it looks as though she has her eyes set on two of Litchfield Hottest.

name: Lolly
about: Lolly just recently trasnfered from Chicago to Litchfield and she looks like she just might push all the wrong buttons with some.

name: Pete Harper
about: Polly's husband.

name: Tricia Miller
about: Tricia is an addict that relapses in Litchfield.

name: Anita De Marco
about: Anita is Piper's first roomate in Litchfield

name: Bill Chapman
about: Bill Chapman is the father of Piper Chapman and the patriarch of the Chapman family. He is married to Carol Chapman.

name: Celeste Chapman
about: Celeste Chapman was Piper and Cal's grandmother, and also the mother of Bill Chapman and mother-in-law of Carol Chapman.

name: Fahri
about: Fahri worked for the international drug cartel that Alex Vause came to work for.

name: Josephine
about: Josephine was the wife of Jean Baptiste. She appeared in the second flashback that Miss Claudette had in the episode "Imaginary Enemies". Claudette received a letter from Baptiste later in the episode in which he told her that Josephine had died. He did not reveal the cause of death.

name: RJ
about: RJ was one of Vee's unofficially "adopted" children whom she subsequently employed to sell heroin. RJ was also a brother figure to Taystee.

name: Diane Vause
about: Diane Vause is Alex Vause's mom.

name: Wade Donaldson
about: Donaldson is a stern officer who does not tolerate nonsense from the inmates.

name: Aydin
about: Aydin is correctional officer at Litchfield.
